# Setup

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

#Install Packages (https://github.com/zakrobinson/RLDNe/blob/master/README.md)
#devtools::install_github(repo="zakrobinson/RLDNe")
#install.packages("vcfR")
#install.packages("tidyverse")

#Load Packages
library(RLDNe)
library(vcfR)
library(tidyverse)
```

# Download Data

```{bash}
rsync abc6435@submit.hpc.psu.edu:/storage/home/abc6435/SzpiechLab/abc6435/KROH/data/rldne/hKIWA_rldne.vcf /Users/annamariacalderon/Desktop/KROH/data/rldne
```

# Import/Modify Data

```{r}
setwd("/Users/annamariacalderon/Desktop/KROH/data/rldne")
vcf <- read.table("hKIWA_rldne.vcf", header = TRUE)
colnames(vcf) <- c("CHROM", "POS", "sam29779", 
                   "sam383194", "sam383202", "sam383205", 
                   "sam507264", "sam507265", "CHROM_POS")

vcf <- vcf[,c(9,3:8)]

```
